description: PersistentVolumeClaim is a user's request for and claim to a persistent volume

status.description: Status represents the current information/status of a persistent volume claim. Read-only. More info: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/persistent-volumes#persistentvolumeclaims

spec.description: Spec defines the desired characteristics of a volume requested by a pod author. More info: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/persistent-volumes#persistentvolumeclaims
